text: Nikolai Nikolaevich Ivanov (22 January 1943 - 11 December 2020) was a Russian actor. He was born in Leningrad, Soviet Union. His career began in 1961. His best known roles were as Kolka in The Red Tent (1969), Pytor in The Love of Mankind (1972) and as Colonel Victor in Battle of Moscow (1985). Ivanov died on 11 December 2020 in Saint Petersburg, Russia at the age of 77.Скончался народный артист России Николай Иванов ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors
title: Nikolai Ivanov
